author: Torstein HÃ¸nsi <https://github.com/highslide-software>
description: Highcharts pattern fill plugin for Highcharts 4. For Highcharts 3.x, the pattern fill version 1.0.x was used.
name: pattern-fill

scripts.build: node node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs pattern-fill.js --source-map pattern-fill.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources -o pattern-fill.min.js -m && node node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs pattern-fill-v2.js --source-map pattern-fill-v2.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources -o pattern-fill-v2.min.js -m
